Road.description: A deserted road that stretches off into the distance in both directions. I wouldn't even think of trying to go anywhere on foot.

Driveway.description: A small yard with a driveway and a mailbox.

Hall.description: A pretty average entrance hall for a house this size.

Living Room.description: A cozy living room filled with family photos and a TV.

Guest Bedroom.description: A bedroom for guests with a medium-sized bed.

Master Bedroom.description: A bedroom with a large bed, and various personal belongings.

Kids' Bedroom.description: A room full of toys, posters etc. Kid stuff.

Kitchen.description: A well-used kitchen with various appliances and a dining table.

Study.description: A study with a bookshelf and a computer on a tidy desk, and one of those fancy office chairs.

Patio.description: A yard with a treehouse and a barbecue grill.

Garden.description: A yard with a treehouse and a barbecue grill.

Garage.description: The inside of a rather tidy double garage.
